name: redis-central-emea-dashboard
description: Central EMEA Go-to-Market Dashboard powered by Redis Cloud

scripts.build: cd central-emea-dashboard/frontend && npm install --no-fund && NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production
scripts.vercel-build: cd central-emea-dashboard/frontend && npm install && NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production

author: Thomas Gregg
